title: Team USA knocks out Sweden in overtime to reach Olympic men’s hockey semifinals
desc: The Americans will play for an Olympic medal after Quinn Hughes played the hero in overtime on Wednesday night in Milan.

title: Judge appointed to lead new Corruption Court
desc: PETALING JAYA: Kuala Lumpur High Court judge Noor Ruwena Md Nurdin (pic) has been appointed to preside over the newly established Special Corruption High Court to ensure the swift resolution of corruption cases.

title: Pedestrian critically hurt after being struck by CTrain in NE Calgary
desc: A pedestrian is in life-threatening condition after they were struck by a CTrain in northeast Calgary late Wednesday afternoon.

title: Power open another list spot as four players fight for lifeline
desc: Port Adelaide moves Ivan Soldo to its inactive list

title: Alberta Premier Danielle Smith to address immigration during province-wide address
desc: Responding to a staffer's controversial comments about immigration, Alberta Premier Danielle Smith says she'll be speaking about the issue in a province-wide address on Thursday.

title: The cameraman who skates backward to capture Olympic triumph and defeat
desc: Former U.S. ice dancer Jordan Cowan now skates on the Olympic rink as a camera operator, giving viewers for the first time a close look at figure skaters’ emotions.

title: Blizzard Sends Legal Notice to bbno$ Over Diablo-Themed Website
desc: bbno$ has temporarily shut down his website after receiving a legal notice from Blizzard Entertainment related to Diablo-themed content. It is an unusual development. Even so, few would have expected ...
